Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI - readily awailable, very good to have an initial idea, and feedback

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: with GenAI, I have an initial idea on what to work on, that helped me to refine my writing, information etc, where as, teacher's feedback consolidates my ideas and information.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: feedback from AI is, I feel non-judgmental, I am free to make mistakes and laugh at my mistakes. Where as with teacher, there is certain amount of stress involved, fear of being judged, fear of making mistakes
